title: English-Turkish Title And Caption Translation
context:
When encountering titles , headings, figure captions and table names in an English context, Include the Turkish translation of the title or table name in parentheses beside the English version.
Donot use this rule outside titles , headings, figure captions and table names
Examples:
"# Customer Information " to "# Customer Information (Müşteri Bilgileri)"
" Table 3.1 Graph of responses" to "Tablo 3.1 Yanıt Grafiği"
